events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund as it doesn't fit me well and I am not satisfied with the quality.
The customer has requested a refund due to dissatisfaction with product fit and quality.
Assigning ticket to Refund Department to handle the customer's refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with the refund process for your recent jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can process your request quickly?
Sure, my order number is 456789. I want a refund because the jacket is too small and the material feels cheap compared to the website description.
Thanks for the details. You can return the jacket using our prepaid shipping label, and once we receive it, we will issue a full refund within 5 business days.
That sounds good. I appreciate the quick response and the easy return instructions.
Weâ€™ve processed your refund as the returned jacket has been received. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 days.
Just following up to ensure that you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Closing this case as resolved. Thank you for reaching out and we hope to serve you better next time.
We have sent you a feedback survey to hear about your experience with our refund process. Your input helps us improve.
